subject.description: Young woman with a fit, slender build
subject.hair: Dark brown to black hair, styled in a sleek, tight ponytail with a middle part
subject.eyes: Light green or hazel, striking and clear
subject.skin: Light complexion with a radiant, dewy finish
subject.expression: Neutral to slight pout, soft and alluring gaze looking directly at the camera
subject.pose: Selfie angle, one arm extended holding the camera, the other arm raised with hand touching the back of the head/neck area

attire.clothing: White, tight-fitting spaghetti strap tank top

accessories.neck: Gold chain necklace with a medium-sized heart pendant
accessories.ears: Multiple ear piercings; small gold hoops and pink/purple huggie hoop earrings
accessories.wrists: Stacked bracelets on the left wrist including a gold screw-motif bangle (Cartier style), a diamond tennis bracelet, and delicate gold chains
accessories.fingers: Multiple gold rings stacked on the left hand

makeup.details: Defined eyebrows, highlighter on cheekbones and tip of the nose, glossy nude-pink lips, subtle mascara

environment.background: Wallpaper featuring a repeating pattern of vintage bicycles, white door frame, cream-colored walls, glimpse of wooden flooring
environment.lighting: Soft, warm artificial indoor lighting, creating a golden hour glow effect on the skin

technical_specs.quality: Photorealistic, highly detailed textures, sharp focus
technical_specs.style: Influencer selfie, candid, high-end lifestyle photography
